subject: Soccer
lead_paragraph: The fact that Tahiti, a team made up almost exclusively of amateurs, is in the Confederations Cup is something of a miracle. The coach has modest objectives: “We are honest. Tahiti has not come to win.”
snippet: The fact that Tahiti, a team made up almost exclusively of amateurs, is in the Confederations Cup is something of a miracle. The coach has modest objectives: “We are honest. Tahiti has not come to win.”
